long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click - Comment - Share

FREE Simple Screenshot Sharing Tool

* CLICK to capture a web page with a single click
* COMMENT anywhere on the screenshot
* SHARE the image and comments with anyone with a copied URL

It's that simple. Other chrome extensions that do something similar provide complicated image editing interfaces and don't have built-in image sharing. You don't have time for that!

Have any thoughts or suggestions? Email us at hello@listeri.com. We'd love to hear from you.

No ads...ever. No spyware. We don't sell or share your information with anyone.
